name: 12/25/1998 (gamejam)
description:
CONTROLS:Z (Hold) = Play Game/Resume Playing GameX = Turn off TVArrow Keys = Choose Hiding Place

The date is 12/25/1998, you've just received a very popular game for Christmas and you can't wait to dive into it, but your mother doesn't want you up playing all night. Hide from your mom and try to beat the game on Christmas night!

Follow Pezomi on TwitterFollow Cade Legat on Twitter
